Uses of Package
org.eclipse.smarthome.core.persistence

  • Packages that use org.eclipse.smarthome.core.persistence 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.smarthome.core.persistence  
    org.eclipse.smarthome.model.persistence.extensions  
    org.eclipse.smarthome.model.persistence.tests  
  • Classes in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.persistence used by org.eclipse.smarthome.core.persistence 
    Class and Description
    FilterCriteria
    This class is used to define a filter for queries to a PersistenceService.
    FilterCriteria.Operator
    Enumeration with all possible compare options
    FilterCriteria.Ordering
    Enumeration with all ordering options
    HistoricItem
    This interface is used by persistence services to represent an item with a certain state at a given point in time.
    PersistenceItemInfo
    This class provides information about an item that is stored in a persistence service.
    PersistenceService
    A persistence service which can be used to store data from openHAB.
    PersistenceServiceConfiguration
    This class represents the configuration for a persistence service.
    QueryablePersistenceService
    A queryable persistence service which can be used to store and retrieve data from openHAB.
    SimpleFilter 
    SimpleItemConfiguration
    This class holds the configuration of a persistence strategy for specific items.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.persistence used by org.eclipse.smarthome.model.persistence.extensions 
    Class and Description
    HistoricItem
    This interface is used by persistence services to represent an item with a certain state at a given point in time.
    PersistenceServiceRegistry
    This is the interface for a central service that provides access to PersistenceServices.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.smarthome.core.persistence used by org.eclipse.smarthome.model.persistence.tests 
    Class and Description
    FilterCriteria
    This class is used to define a filter for queries to a PersistenceService.
    HistoricItem
    This interface is used by persistence services to represent an item with a certain state at a given point in time.
    PersistenceItemInfo
    This class provides information about an item that is stored in a persistence service.
    PersistenceService
    A persistence service which can be used to store data from openHAB.
    QueryablePersistenceService
    A queryable persistence service which can be used to store and retrieve data from openHAB.
